Class Genotype

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jama.Matrix
      • Genotype
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Genotype
extends Jama.Matrix
    A class for generating a Genotype, it extends from Matrix. An instance is basically a matrix plus a Phenotype and a HashMap which will contain differents phenotypes.
    Author:
    Jerome PIVERT, Raphael CHARLES
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
